Package org.apache.juneau.config.event

Class ConfigEvent

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.config.event.ConfigEvent
public class ConfigEvent
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a change to a config.

  • Method Details

    • setEntry

      public static ConfigEvent setEntry​(java.lang.String config, java.lang.String section, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value, java.lang.String modifiers, java.lang.String comment, java.util.List<java.lang.String> prelines)
      Sets or replaces a value in a configuration.
      Parameters:
      config - The configuration name.
      section - The section name.
      Must not be null.
      key - The entry name.
      Must not be null.
      value - The entry value.
      Can be null to remove an entry.
      comment - Optional comment string to add on the same line as the entry.
      modifiers - Optional entry modifiers.
      prelines - Comment lines that occur before this entry.
      Must not be null.
      Returns:
      A new ConfigEvent object.

    • removeEntry

      public static ConfigEvent removeEntry​(java.lang.String config, java.lang.String section, java.lang.String key)
      Removes a value from a configuration.
      Parameters:
      config - The configuration name.
      section - The section name.
      Must not be null.
      key - The entry name.
      Must not be null.
      Returns:
      A new ConfigEvent object.

    • setSection

      public static ConfigEvent setSection​(java.lang.String config, java.lang.String section, java.util.List<java.lang.String> prelines)
      Adds a new empty section to the config.
      Parameters:
      config - The configuration name.
      section - The section name.
      prelines - Comment lines that occur before this section.
      Must not be null.
      Returns:
      A new ConfigEvent object.

    • removeSection

      Removes a section from the config.
      Parameters:
      config - The configuration name.
      section - The section name.
      Returns:
      A new ConfigEvent object.
